title: Prayer Alley, Sucre, Bolivia
marks: Signature LRC on mount, in pencil: [Esther Parada]
description: two figures in shadow, leaning against a wall; figure at left in profile from PL, wearing a cap; man at right wearing glasses, a cap, a suit jacket and a large crucifix
creditline: Gift of the family of Esther Parada:  Adam Wilson, son; Margo Davion and Susan Peters, sisters; and Benjamin Glaser, brother
